LanguageData.CP_Description: This menu allows you to set custom storyteller population limits. The default values are the values set in the StorytellerDef xml files.\n\nWARNING: Setting very high values may cause your game to lag or crash!
LanguageData.CP_MinPopTip: Set the minimum population limit for this storyteller.
LanguageData.CP_MaxPopTip: Set the maximum population limit for this storyteller.
LanguageData.CP_CritPopTip: Set the critical population limit for this storyteller.
